thread.title: Tottenham midfielder Nacer Chadli out injured for 6 weeks
thread.title_full: Tottenham midfielder Nacer Chadli out injured for 6 weeks

author: wtopstaff
title: Tottenham midfielder Nacer Chadli out injured for 6 weeks
text:
Home » News » Sports » Tottenham midfielder Nacer Chadli… Tottenham midfielder Nacer Chadli out injured for 6 weeks By The Associated Press October 20, 2015 8:21 am 
LONDON (AP) — Tottenham says midfielder Nacer Chadli will be out for six weeks with an ankle ligament injury sustained against Liverpool. 
The Belgium international went down after only eight minutes of the 0-0 draw on Saturday at White Hart Lane. He attempted to continue but was eventually taken off on a stretcher after 11 minutes. 
The 26-year-old Chadli’s time out means he is expected to miss Tottenham’s Premier League matches against London rivals Arsenal on Nov. 8 and Chelsea on Nov. 29. Topics:
